item.title: Super Pocket Neo Geo Edition Review: Pocketable Fun
item.description: Portable retro greatness, with great compromises.

item.title: A Surprise Pokémon Game Just Dropped for Switch and Mobile
item.description: Pokémon Friends, available now, is a daily puzzle game that lets players untangle yarn to make prizes.

item.title: Italian YouTuber Faces Jail Time for Showing Android Handhelds With Emulated Games
item.description: The games on the devices shown by the content creator may not be entirely legal. That was enough for Italian law enforcement to ding him for “promotion of pirated copyrighted materials.”
